body_html: We could optionally have a flag for whether a dimension should be added (if the new type is smaller) or removed (if the new type is bigger). Adding / removing dimensions is more natural in most cases. In fact, maybe it should just be the only way?
body_text: We could optionally have a flag for whether a dimension should be added (if the new type is smaller) or removed (if the new type is bigger).  Adding / removing dimensions is more natural in most cases.  In fact, maybe it should just be the only way?
body: We could optionally have a flag for whether a dimension should be added (if the new type is smaller) or removed (if the new type is bigger).  Adding / removing dimensions is more natural in most cases.  In fact, maybe it should just be the only way?
